text: The Shrine of the Book (, ) is a famous building in the Israel Museum in Jerusalem. It shows the Dead Sea scrolls that were discovered in 1947 at Khirbet Qumran by the Archaeologist Dr. Yigael Yadin. == Other websites == * The Shrine of the Book at the Israel Museum, Jerusalem * The Shrine of the Book * The Israel Museum, Jerusalem Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Dead Sea Scrolls
title: Shrine of the Book
